name: storage-tank-detector
description: A GBDX task that detects storage tanks. Storage tanks include any round object containing oil, water, or gas.

inputPortDescriptors.name: ps_image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains a 3-band pan-sharpened image in geotiff format and UTM projection. This directory should contain only one image otherwise one is selected arbitrarily.

inputPortDescriptors.name: model
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains a keras model in h5 format.

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_compactness
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum compactness of a feature to qualify as a tank candidate. Default is 0.65.

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_size
inputPortDescriptors.description: The minimum area in m2 to qualify as a tank candidate. Default is 100.

inputPortDescriptors.name: max_size
inputPortDescriptors.description: Maximum area in m2 to qualify as a tank candidate. Default is 12000.

outputPortDescriptors.name: detections
outputPortDescriptors.description: Contains geojson file with detection bounding boxes.

outputPortDescriptors.name: candidates
outputPortDescriptors.description: Contains geojson file with candidate bounding boxes.
